sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effects of surgical treatment of giant clival chordoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨型斜坡中線區脊索瘤的手術治療方法。

sentences.english: So I, with my push broom in hand, climbed the ramps.
sentences.chinese: 所以我手拿掃帚，爬上斜坡。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean mounted this inclined plane and reached the other side of the quagmire.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿讓走上這平坦的斜坡，就走到了泥沼的另一邊。

sentences.english: The climber traversed a long horizontal crack in the face of the mountain slope.
sentences.chinese: 登山者橫貫了山脈斜坡表面一段長的水平裂縫。

sentences.english: Her garden is built on a slope broken into 21)tiers.
sentences.chinese: 她的花園建在一個修成好幾級的斜坡上。

sentences.english: It is where yugoloths cavort on endless volcanic slopes .
sentences.chinese: 在那裏尤哥羅斯魔活躍於無盡的火山斜坡之上。

sentences.english: Green sand beach lies on the slopes of the world's largest active volcano mauna loa.
sentences.chinese: 綠沙海灘就位於全球最大的活火山冒納羅亞的斜坡上。

sentences.english: The slope inclines at an angle of fifty degrees.
sentences.chinese: 斜坡以五十度角向下傾斜。

sentences.english: Green sand beach lies on the slopes of the world's largest active volcano maun a loa.
sentences.chinese: 綠沙海灘就位於全球最大的活火山冒納羅亞的斜坡上。

sentences.english: Up another incline and he parked the Peugeot in a sandy lot.
sentences.chinese: 再往上另一個斜坡，他把這皮哥特車停在一塊沙地上。

sentences.english: The far side of the hollow he was in opened up into a downward slope .
sentences.chinese: 他掉進來的凹地前面是個往下的斜坡。

sentences.english: There are two types of fluid inclusions: petroleum inclusions and aqueous inclusions in the reservoir sandstones.
sentences.chinese: 埕島東斜坡帶砂岩儲層發育石油包裹體與鹽水包裹體。

sentences.english: Be informed of the length and incline of your walk.
sentences.chinese: 要知道所走路程的長度和斜坡。

sentences.english: The tank was lumbering up a slope.
sentences.chinese: 坦克正隆隆地開上一個斜坡。

sentences.english: The skier floated down the slope like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪者滑下斜坡，飄逸得像一隻鳥。

sentences.english: You might be feeling like your life right now is one giant downhill slope.
sentences.chinese: 你或許感到現在你的生活是一個巨大的向下的斜坡。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
